content: the weather is changing and what better way to welcome fall then to make my easy granny stitch scarf pattern you can make it in just a few hours so you can wear it on your next outing **materials** ▢4 different shades of wander yarn by furl ▢5 5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** chains - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet
